/* CSS placed here will be applied to all skins */

/* Style the Big Green Arrow */
a.bga2 {
    display: block;
    background-image: url(/gwiki/files/arrow.png);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: 0 10px;
    text-decoration: none; 
    width: 214px; height: 97px;
    color: #309;
    padding-top: 75px;
    padding-left: 20px;
    margin-right: 10px;
    font-weight: bold;
}


/* Show document icon for internal PDF links */
#bodyContent a.internal[href$=".pdf"] {
	background: url("/gwiki/skins/common/images/document.png")
	        center right no-repeat;
	padding-right: 12px;
}

/* Hack monospace font size for Firefox and Safari */
tt, code, kbd, samp, xmp, pre, plaintext {
    font-family: monospace, monospace;
}

/* Control size of autosuggest in search */
table.os-suggest-results {
    font-size: 75%;
}

/* Rendering of Haskell code uses unicode characters.  To
   enable rendering in IE, we need to choose a suitable font.
   Firefox manages fine on its own. */
span.at_symbol {
    font-family: Lucida Sans Unicode, sans-serif;
}

/* Junk the fancy dotted boxes around preformatted text */
pre {
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
    margin-left: 2em;
    background: none;
    line-height: 1.2em;
}

/* No fancy background for code either */
code {
    background: none;
}

/* Examples for GeomLab */
table.twin {
    width: 80%;			/* 100% breaks IE6 */
}

td.input {
    padding-left: 24px;
}

td.output {
    text-align: right;
    padding-right: 24px;
}

div.sourceList {
    -moz-column-count: 2;
    -webkit-column-count: 2;
    column-count: 2;
    margin-left: 2em;
}
